[[File:SLIDE 2.jpg|vignette|Mammary asymmetry, left breast inflamed and edematous, orange peel appearance]]
[[File:Slide 3.jpg|vignette|Mammary retraction ("axe-like") opposite the 3 o'clock radius of the left breast]]

question.title: What is a common symptom of breast skin lesions/anomalies?
question.description: A breast skin lesion/anomaly may present with which of the following symptoms?

option_a.title: Swollen lymph nodes
option_a.description: Enlarged lymph nodes in the neck or armpits

option_b.title: Itching or redness
option_b.description: Skin itching or redness around the affected area

option_d.title: Nipple discharge
option_d.description: A bloody or lactescent discharge from the nipple

correct_option.title: Nipple discharge
correct_option.description: A bloody or lactescent discharge from the nipple
